performSync(address).notice: SYNC EXERCISE  AMPL token had a negative rebase, meaning there was reduction in supply by adjusting the  balance among all holders including ETH/AMPL pool, allowing trades to receive sub-optimal rates.  The challenge is to force reserves to match the current balances in the ETH/AMPL pool.
